banner.title: Social Media Advertising Assets Solutions
banner.dsp: We provide comprehensive Meta advertising asset solutions, including convenient account setup, recharge, and transfer services. GoGo Marketing™  offers you complete advertising asset support.

service.title: Business accounts, stable and durable, with a usage duration of up to 6 months, suitable for promoting any product.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.dsp:
Payment has been successful, please contact customer service 
immediately and send a screenshot of the order, we will
quickly process the account you purchased for you.

fail.title: Payment Fail
fail.dsp: There was a problem with the payment process, please try again or contact our customer service
